title: Board game
headline: Board Game
text: While I was studying abroad, I created a frame-by-frame animation about board games. It's made up of six scenes, each with morphing transitions. I used a different camera setting for each scene to create variety and dynamism. I made it using the software TVPaint.

I also did some sound design, creating the audio in Audition and editing it in Premiere. The project has given me the opportunity to level up my technical skills in frame-by-frame animation and sound design.
